mapper.select: SELECT t5.id, t5.api_name, t5.api_url, t5.api_method, t5.pid, t5.api_sort, t5.description, t5.create_time, t5.update_time FROM t_admin t1 LEFT JOIN t_role_admin t2 ON t1.id = t2.admin_id LEFT JOIN t_role t3 ON t2.role_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN t_role_permission t4 ON t4.role_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN t_permission t5 ON t4.permission_id = t5.id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.user_name=#{userName}
